title: CSV Content Analyzer
description: Upload any CSV file and get an AI-generated summary of what the data represents, key columns, and suggested insights

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop CSV upload, display AI analysis of file content

interactions: User drops CSV → parse with Papa Parse → call window.geaRuntimeLLM(prompt) → display summary
Prompt: 'Analyze this CSV and tell me what it is about, key columns, and 3 insights. No code. JSON keys: topic,summary,keyColumns,insights.'
Store last 5 analyses in local storage for quick reload
acceptance_criteria: Accepts any CSV without predefined schema
Shows clear error if file not CSV
